For the winter term 2017/18, the course *Introduction to R* takes place on:

- March 12, 09:00 - 12:00: Preparatory course 
- March 13, 09:00 - 15:00: Basics, data types, operators and vectors
- March 14, 09:00 - 15:00: Data import, data frames, functions
- March 15, 09:00 - 15:00: Extraction, updating
- March 16, 09:00 - 15:00: Visualization and presentation

We meet at the [Regional Computing Centre (RRZK) of the University of Cologne](https://goo.gl/maps/Do8i2vCYgJt), *Seminar room 3*.
